title: Trelica End User Guide
content:
https://app.trelica.com/Catalog Trelica is a cloud-based SaaS management platform which provides tools for app discovery, inventory management, and spend & license tracking. With Trelica, admins can automate the discovery of apps and usage insights. A live inventory of all SaaS apps provides admins with insights into who is responsible for each application, which are in use, and how they are being used. What can you do with Trelica? [Image] Trelica can help you request access or a license to an app, get approval from the app owner, and have it added to your Okta dashboard within minutes. How do I access Trelica? To access the application hub, you can log in through Okta, or open your Trelica browser extension and click 'Open Trelica'. How do I request access or a license to an application? In the app hub, you will see a list of available applications - many of which you might already have an account with. The apps that you do not already have an account with will show up with a “Request Access” button in the top right. [Image]

Page Labels: virtual_agent
